name: Hit Back (VilSim)
description:
Hit the ball back, or it will hit you!

Welcome to "Hit Back" The Game! It's a game based on Ping - Pong, where 2 players can control their board and hit the ball. If the ball goes into opponent's gates, the player who scored gets a point. Currently the player must get 3 stars to win, and to get a star, you will need to score 5 goals into enemy's gates. 

Currently the game is in early BETA version, so you can expect some bugs showing up. In the up-coming versions we plan to add Multiplayer, Game with bot, better menus, and just finish the game to perfection.

Currently the game contains:

  • 5 arenas with all different balls,
  • Music and Audio,
  • Settings,
  • Menu,
  • Random arena loading system,
  • 2 different Player skins based on arena that You're playing in.

Merry Christmas!
